options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to lint.

options.name: helpJson
options.description: Shows the metadata associated with each flags, in JSON format.

options.name: tslintConfig
options.description: The name of the TSLint configuration file.

options.name: tsConfig
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: fix
options.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

options.name: typeCheck
options.description: Controls the type check for linting.

options.name: force
options.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

options.name: format
options.description: Output format (prose, json, stylish, verbose, pmd, msbuild, checkstyle, vso, fileslist).
